text: A ghaze, “Atrivimɨn akar dɨkɨrɨzir gavgavim kamaghɨn iti, gumazamiziba bar a gɨfo. A ghaze, nɨ tina pura uan nɨghnɨzimɨn atrivimɨn gansɨ, tiar akar aven itimɨn mangɨghan kogham. Bar puvatɨ. Nɨ kamaghɨn damigh nɨ ovegham. A uabɨ nɨn diaghtɨ nɨ mangɨva an ganam. Tuavir vamɨra kamagh iti, nɨ aven mangɨtɨ atrivim nɨn ganigh uan golɨn atrivir fidizim feghtɨ, nɨ oveghan kogham. Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn, atrivim nan diazɨ kɨ an ganasa aven ghuzir puvatɨzɨ iakɨnir vamɨra gɨfa.”
